name: Zold:out
storyline: The story of Zold:out begins in an unknown weapon store in Ozin Port, where a merchant and a weaponsmith meet and set out on a journey to sell weapons. Along the way, they encounter the collapse of Emerus City, which reveals the secret of a cabal from another world.
summary: Zold:out is a semi-turn-based tactical RPG fused with deck building. You will use multiple weapons in one turn to challenge powerful enemies in a seamless battlefield. Recruit clerks, forge weapons, and save the world with your strategy and creativity!
